description: Retrieves a synonym map definition from Azure Search.

synonym_map_name.description: The name of the synonym map to retrieve.

client_request_id.description: The tracking ID sent with the request to help with debugging.

name.description: The name of the synonym map.

format.description: The format of the synonym map. Only the 'solr' format is currently supported.

synonyms.description: A series of synonym rules in the specified synonym map format. The rules must be separated by newlines.

odataetag.description: The ETag of the synonym map.
